place_description:
Backyard Brew (Charlotte, NC Dilworth Neighborhood) is a family-owned and operated coffee and tea spot located in a house, in the historic district. We specialize in custom tailoring drinks to each person’s taste and wonderful customer experiences. Seeing you happy, makes us happy!

Backyard Brew is a concept that started in Palo Alto, CA in 2016 with the goal of not only make amazing coffee but to create memorable & amazing experiences. Our family envisions a creative community space for all. Venturing out, we are organically growing our business & soon to be opening more locations in North Carolina.
We source and roast all of our ethically grown, organic coffee.
We source and blend all of our own teas.

reviews_data.review_text: I've never left this place disappointed. Great coffee, great bites, awesome peeps. Such a Charlotte gem.
Charming little coffee shop. quality coffee, quality vibes, exceptional service.
I really love this coffee shop, we make sure to stop by anytime we are in Charlotte. The owner is always so welcoming and we look forward to speaking with him at the window each visit

This was my first time visiting this coffee shop. Their drink selection was super unique and interesting, and the atmosphere was cute and inviting. The service was great and very friendly. They made sure my drink was made exactly how I wanted it, and even offered to adjust the sweetness. They were also very funny and gave me two little ducks.

I like to try local coffee in every city I make a trip to, and despite the reviews was very disappointed by this place. I ordered two drinks: a vanilla extract low sweetness iced latte and a maple medium sweetness iced latte. Vanilla extract I threw away after one sip. The maple one didn't taste of maple in any noticeable way to me, but made for a good sipping coffee. The atmosphere of the shop is nice.

Fabulous find! Such a great experience! The man at the register was such a character! He made my day! All of the drinks we had were delicious and they can customize any drink to your flavor, sweetness, or spice specifications. The pistachio croissant was PHENOMENAL! Not just a flavor, but real pistachios and so delicious. I also got to try out a matcha drink they whipped up and, as a matcha lover, the flavor was top notch. I cannot recommend this place enough! My friends and I will be back!
Great customer service and really good coffee. Took advantage of writing on the wall to commemorate our trip.

The most magical (!!) coffee shop I have been to in CLT so far :)))
The staff is oh so friendly and entertains my nonsense I want to discuss when I'm avoiding doing work. The front porch is an especially magical environment and the inside of the house is quite unique. My new favorite spot!!
The best coffee in Charlotte!

I discovered Backyard Brew after searching for a local coffee shop with outdoor seating. It's a super cute spot in a great area, and the owner already remembers me after 3 visits! The owner and employees are nice and passionate about what they are doing. And also important - the coffee, matcha and food are AMAZING! Today I had a pistachio baklava latte - iced at TK's recommendation - and it was such a cool combination of flavor.  I also got a banana nut muffin, which I happily munched on driving back to my house. So yummy!

I'm happy I found Backyard Brew and highly recommend everyone trying them out

Rating 100%
Excellent varieties of coffees, lattes, etc
Looks like a nice place to grab a latte, but do not step inside you will be appalled at how trashy it is inside. And 6 to $7 for a 12oz latte is hilarious.

Back at it again. Love TK and my people at Backyard Brews!
--
We love Backyard Brews. The guys there are awesome and the food and coffee are great too. It feels like they love every second of their day... just like they love every customer.
When you're here you feel at home!

My daughter and I had a lovely morning at Backyard Brew! The atmosphere was so relaxing and welcoming, the staff was so kind and friendly, and the coffee and burrito were incredible! Thank you so much, we will definitely be back.

It's a wonderful coffee shop!
I had a Brazilian pour-over with cardamom and it was perfectly smooth and flavorful.
The owner is nice, gentle and knowledgeable.
Layout of the place deserves a special praise.

I'm from Florida visiting my daughter that lives in Charlotte. Charlotte has many coffee spots and everytime I come I go to new spots plus the few I like. This was first visit to Backyard Brew and the coffee is the absolute best that I have had in Charlotte. I got a double espresso and each sip was better than the last. The coffee had notes of caramel, nutty flavor and chocolate. It was very rich and strong in those flavors. Simply delectable!
TK is really nice and cool. Great conversation! Great customer service! I got a bag of the beans to take back with me. I love Charlotte and its food scene is incredible. Again Backyard Brew serves up the best straight coffee that I've gotten in Charlotte!
Yeah, don't even think about it. This is the coffee shop to go to. The nicest baristas In Charlotte. Coffee is curated and top tier. Will definitely come back!!
Amazing place. DUCKING awesome. Immediately made me feel welcomed and comfortable. Coffee being good is the icing on top of the cake!

TK is the reason I'll keep coming back! He was so kind and personable, which is weirdly rare to find these days. He personally made it his mission to connect with every single customer. So heartwarming to see! You MUST try the golden milk latte. I've had quite a few different ones all Charlotte, but this one takes the cake. Perfect amount of spice to milk ratio. Highly recommend the banana muffin also! Perfectly moist and flavorful. You know when cafes get the basics right they know what they're doing
Coffee House in a converted Dilworth home with a nice porch. I had the coffee with cinnamon, it was very unique smooth taste.

I tried 3 times to pull into this place. It's a single driveway on a busy street where only one car can go in or out at a time. You either back up traffic or you don't go in if there is another car. It's incredibly frustrating and I wasn't able to stop to check it out. I cannot recommend it. Maybe the coffee is good but how can someone who doesn't live nearby tell?
Loved the vibe, the man who took my order was super friendly. The food and cappuccino came fast and was delicious.
Cute spot! Quick service and super friendly staff. Thank for a delightful latte
The banana bread latte was wonderful!!!! I almost went back for another one after I finished! Very unique atmosphere and everyone was super friendly!
Super nice people here! LOTS of flavors for coffee and they can make you basically anything you'd like!

The man TK who greeted my friend and I was SO helpful and tailored our drinks just to our liking! He even gave us some stickers and my friend a free treat for her birthday. The fireplace outside is a nice touch in the colder months. True hospitality here... grateful for kind folks who do good. BTW the drinks are phenomenal! Fairly priced to be organic too

Came for the coffee, stayed for the VIBES!!
When I tell you this was the best coffee shop experience I've ever had, it filled my heart
100/10 experience!! Amazing customer service, great fresh coffee, made with love!! Doesn't get any better than that.
Wow!!! Greate!
Breakfast burrito is on point, the folks that run this place are super friendly.  The Jordanian pancakes are delicious.
legit best coffee joint in CLT.  they don't use run of the mill syrups like every other place.  best cust svc too!

Made a pit stop for some caffeine to fuel a long drive. I parked in the back and was warmly greeted by TK. He showed me the layout of the coffee shop and I really liked how the building was given a second life. TK was very helpful and recommended a delicious tea blend and the breakfast burrito with some turkey sausage (just thinking about it has my mouth watering). I also got the pistachio baklava latte. Everything I ordered was solid! Should I find myself in the area again, I'll definitely be coming back to Backyard  Brew!
The best coffee in Charlotte - hands down. Great service too!
Backyard Brew is the best coffee spot in Charlotte. They take hospitality to the next level. TK is the man and always brings a smile to everyone's face
best coffee shop in town. all of the baristas are incredible and make you feel so welcome. the pistachio croissant is a must try!

The PURE customer service of this GEM is impeccable came here for the first time today, and WHY have I not come sooner?! It was drizzling, and my partner and I were looking at the menu outside, I see the owners FLY up out of the seats inside and PROMPTLY greet us as if they'd been waiting for us to arrive! So sweet and warm welcoming. The man told us to come on inside and we can order where it's warm. So hospitable, it's as if we were family. Both owners said he would be happy to make the drinks to our liking and he even gave us a sampling; SO above and beyond. We've been to EASILY over 100+ different coffee shops and this one really stood out. I ordered the banana bread latte and gingerbread and they were made with love and care. Do yourself the favor people and support support support!!!! Forget about silly starbucks, they don't do lattes like these people do! Not the mention ALL the specialty lattes

Insanely good service, delicious drinks, and fresh pastries. I got the rose latte and a pistacho croissant that I would 100% recommend and go back for. But there are so many drink options that I feel like I should try something else next time! They gave us a strawberry tea latte thing to sample that was equally delicious. I really don't think you can go wrong here.
First time there and will be back! The ginger bread latte was fantastic! Going to try the banana bread latte next! The atmosphere is great!

Best coffee spot in Charlotte, hands down. My partner and I had our regular coffee place down in Argentina, and we were looking for the same up here, until we found this gem in Dilworth. The coffee is amazing, and the energy and positivity TK brings to the table every day is the best part. Customer service is second to none.

The only critique I would have, is that the parking situation is limited, but worse case scenario you could park across the street at Harris Teeter, it's right across from it.

I arrived at backyard brew early in the morning with my family. We were greeted by the owner, Badr, who was very kind and friendly. The inside is loaded with customer art which I thought was really cool. We ordered the banana bread latte, breakfast burrito and Jordanian pancakes. Everything tasted great. The burrito had a spicy kick to it when I really enjoyed. The pancakes were fluffy to perfection and the  pistachio spread and rose water syrup were delicious! I usually don't get lattes but everyone in the reviews mentioned it so I had to try it. I really enjoyed it because it wasn't loaded with artificial sweeteners, and the maple syrup in the latte tied the drink together. I look forward to stopping there again for breakfast and coffee the next time in Charlotte! Also Badr is a great guy. He helped carry my baby carriage down the stairs.
Omg... the Bananna bread latte with the muffin is AMAZING.... starbucks who?

Stopped by today for a coffee run. I got the banana bread latte with oat milk it was AMAZING as well as the Nutella mocha which wasn't too sweet and wasn't too bitter! Our barista was amazing too, he was very informative about the brand and how they brew the coffee, even gave me a mini rubber ducky. Before I came in I read about them on their website (which I would highly recommend doing, it's such a cool and innovative way to make coffee). The inside is covered with people's art and scribbles, it was really fun to walk around and look at everything. Overall, I would highly recommend stopping by! There's a ton of outdoor seating and fire pits to sit and chill. Although I do wish I got the pancakes instead of the cinnamon roll... guess you'll be seeing me again soon 

As I was writing this our barista came out and turned on the fire table for us! Amazing service! So kind!
Great coffee and great people

What a find! Would recommend for working, relaxing, or meeting a friend for a sip. Cool aesthetic with it being a house, and I loved that you can draw on the walls. Hot chocolate used real cocoa not a mix, and the breakfast burrito was SO good and tasted very fresh. Thank you!

I haven't written a google review before but this place truly deserves it. The owners/workers are very welcoming and personable. I spent the day lounging on my laptop and overheard many encounters. They make you feel like you're visiting a friend's house that you've known for years. The atmosphere is so fun and the outdoor area is great. Lastly, the coffee itself is delicious and they have a lot of unique options with mediterranean spices. The best part is you can customize exactly how sweet you want your latte. This is now my go-to spot.
Favorite coffee shop in Charlotte thus far. Always great customer service especially from Bader (if that's how you spell his name). The lavender matcha's are great!
Great coffee. Great location. Great people behind the counter. I've been going here since they opened and every visit makes me a bit happier. Highly recommended.

We were drawn by the great reviews and drove quite far to get here. Parking was awful, the lot is small and it's one way in and out. We were entering the lot and this lady yelled at us that another car was trying to exit so we backed up backwards and parked across the street. Anyways, this doesn't affect the review. We're from Baltimore, it's a lot worse over there. The vibes outside the cafe were nice. Inside, it was dirty and messy with construction going on. We ordered the pistachio baklava latte with oat milk, a decaf cappuccino with almond milk, and pistachio croissant. The latte was watery. The cappuccino was extremely sour. I've had hundreds of cappuccinos decaf and whatnot in countless cafes and I've never had one as sour as this. I can usually drink or eat things that I don't love, no problem. I couldn't finish this. Pistachio croissant was fantastic and the service was nice. All this to say, I'm sure the great reviews have their merit, but our experience was definitely subpar to say the least.

Well deserving of all the five star reviews!! Came here for the first time since moving to Charlotte but you'd think the man behind the window had known me for years with how friendly he was. I got the Banana Bread Latte (or BBL as they like to call it ) and it was so tasty. They also made me a delicious breakfast burrito even though they normally don't sell them on weekdays! An amazing neighborhood coffee shop, will definitely be back.
The best coffee and matcha latte in the best atmosphere with the nicest staff!

Stumbled upon this coffee shop on my walk to a different coffee shop and soo glad I did! New favorite coffee shop in Charlotte. The workers were extremely nice, there is a walk up window, dog treats, a nice outdoor sitting area, and the best pistachio latte!
Used to frequent Unwind when it was still there. Have found my new favorite local coffee place, the staff combined with the drinks/food items will keep me coming back.
Plenty of parking. Amazing coffee with the best atmosphere.
Ordered a flat white and almond joy. The milk in the flat white tasted off and the dairy free almond joy wasn't good either. Cool place and kind server.

The food here is amazing, on top of that the customer service is great they don't want you leaving without a smile on your face and to top it all off it has a really chill atmosphere definitely recommend!

I've been looking forward to trying this shop for awhile now and went today. When we pulled into the parking lot behind the shop there was a man in a grey Honda Odyssey absolutely SCREAMING at a child in the vehicle. It was so loud you could hear it with all of our windows up and the car in motion. The van had several Backyard Brew stickers on the back and I don't know if it was an employee or a customer, but it had us so shaken we didn't even get out of the car. If it was a customer I'd be happy to amend this to reflect that (and shame on that person) but if it's an employee? No thanks.
Excellent coffee!
Great coffees! I love the pistachio croissant too!. Very nice staff and not crazy busy with people.

Location and concept are nice, coffee was good but not perfect (I ordered cappuccino and got mostly milk like in latte no foam). Pistachio croissant was awesome  however service could be better - first I got my coffee with no cinnamon I had requested, then cinnamon roll was given cold and doesn't taste fresh. And the restroom definitely needs to be checked and cleaned (
Great matcha latte!! Great service!!

I've gotten take out two days in a row and it's been SO good. The pastries are classic with a twist (I highly recommend the pistachio croissant), the Jordan pancakes were spiced perfectly, and the Hug in a Cup drink really helped soothe my nerves on election day. The descriptions on Uber Eats are beautifully written and descriptive so you can understand what you're ordering. 10/10, truly so good.

And to answer your follow up question, I am NOT being compensated for this review-- It's really that good.

The service was great and the workers were friendly, but my vanilla latte tasted horrible and soapy. I wish there was something good I could say about my drink because of how great my experience with the barista was.

I walked up and was instantly greeted with a warm and inviting, "Good morning and happy Monday!" Disarmed and still needing caffeine at least I knew what day it was lol. The coffee bartender known as Bader hooked me up nice and decent as I was enjoyed the service and flavor selection so much I order two cups of joe: ice & hot banana bread latte!!! One for now and one for later of course! Thanks for a pleasant start to a Monday morning! #stayblessed
Adorable spot with its own positive atmosphere. Check it out!

My wife and I were looking for a local coffee shop while passing through town and we stumbled upon Backyard Brew.  The reviews are spot on!  The person taking our order was the best and made many suggestions for us to try.  We went with the Banana Bread Latte and the Nutella Hot Chocolate.  Both were fabulous!  We will definitely be back again!
The Turkish coffee and breakfast burritos are awesome

I of course come for the caffeine and coffee flavor, but the atmosphere and personable experience with the staff is what keeps me  coming back. Every time I bring a friend along, they catch the Backyard Brew bug too!

Absolutely top notch. Staff are hilarious and great to interact with. The coffee is the best we've had in Charlotte. The location / atmosphere is also incredibly unique.

What a spot!

Cappuccino, Raw Mocha, Almond Joy- were amazing.
Wonderfully crafted drinks with uniquely combined ingredients made those drinks highlight of my day.
Thank you Backyard Brew!

We tried this coffee spot for the first time while visiting the city this weekend, and we loved it so much that we came back a few more times! The coffee is consistently great--from regular brews to custom-made drinks. Every cup we had was spot on. The atmosphere is inviting, and the interior is unique, making it a perfect spot to relax or catch up with friends. Highly recommend if you're looking for quality coffee and a cool vibe!

Best coffee ever!
TK is so sweet and warm. I got a hot dirty chai latte with my imprescindible little yellow duck. I really recommend the strawberry cheesecake .
Super friendly customer service, creative and delicious lattes!

Backyard Brew is one of my favorite coffee shops. I love the intimate setting ( indoors and outdoors), the customer service, the quality of the coffee and the natural ingredients. The owners are so nice. P.S. Thanks for my mini ducks

Great place. Very cozy. Friendly staff. AWESOME DRINKS AND FOOD.

You have to try the pancakes, really nice. They have different type of drinks.

You can even draw and write on the walls.. WHAT ELSE CAN YOU ASK FOR???

I was looking for a shop that had tea & this one did not disappoint. My first time in Charlotte and I went back twice. Once for hot cardamom and the second for ice strawberry field. I wanted to try the cardamom pancakes but didn't get the chance. I will certainly try next time.
loved the Oh Canada. great customer service and the owners were so sweet. really looking forward to going back!
Love this spot on East blvd! Recommend the Lentil soup if they have it and all of their drinks are a hit! Parking in back of business is limited.

Backyard brew is a tranquil oasis in a busy little neighborhood. The atmosphere is rustic and charming and the owners are very kind. I got a banana bread latte, ended up not liking it, and they gave me a new drink for free! They wouldn't allow me to pay for the drink so I tipped extra, and they gave me a croissant as thanks. The croissant was sweet and buttery, flaky and crispy yet also soft. Exceptional service from.very kind oners, a local business which is worth a visit whenever you're in Charlotte.
Great coffee, great place to sit and enjoy said coffee

There's a reason why this place has SO many 5-star reviews. The moment you walk in, you're treated like someone who truly matters. In a time when many places have lost that small-town feel and genuine care for people, this spot brings back that sense of community--like a modern-day Cheers, where everyone knows your name.

The vibes, the coffee, the staff, the owner--they're all incredibly grateful for your presence, and it shows. I'll definitely be back, and thank you for seeing me!

Keep shining that positivity out into the world--we need more of it!
This type of place is why we have 100 people a day moving to Charlotte. Great food great atmosphere. Southern hospitality.
I love backyard brew! The coffee was delicious and the service was personable and genuine. It's my go to spot for meeting clients.
Grateful to have stumbled upon such a kind, committed, and thoughtful crew of folks who make some of the tastiest coffee drinks I've had in a good while. I'll be back!
Really great drinks and some of the best customer service you'll ever have from TK
This has got to be one of the loveliest places in Charlotte. Already looking forward to my next time back and trying something new off of their charming menu.

I just moved to Charlotte and I love cafe hopping. I discovered Backyard Brew today and loved it. The service was the best and I LOVE the welcoming atmosphere. As someone with dietary restrictions I truly appreciate the natural options of extracts vs syrups.
From the greeting to the coffee, this place is a true gym! I will definitely be coming back for more coffee and I can't wait to try the food next time.
Absolutely love the Banana Bread Latte and the service here!
Always a mood boost. TK has a light from within that he shares with everyone to brighten their day. Delicious coffee, food, and  thoughtful conversation. Short walk from hospital
Amazing customer service. Consistent service. TK is awesome. Great personality !
Great coffee shop with fun and friendly staff. I really like the banana latte. I think their prices are a little steep but would recommend this place!

This place popped up in my coffee search for the area & it looked super cute so decided to try! Unique interior, as it's eclectic and cozy, almost like it should be in NODA or Plaza instead, but I love the vibe! The baristas are super nice. I tried the banana bread latte and it was pretty good. I tried it iced, I think it may be better hot. And tried the cinnamon roll.

This is an amazing coffee shop, well deserving of their 5-star status. Every coffee I have had from Backyard Brew has made me feel amazing after, in a way that chain shops like Starbucks and Dunkin simply can't. The beans are roasted there, and the flavors and sweetness levels are seperate, meaning having a flavored coffee that isn't as sweet as somewhere like Starbucks is always on the table. The specialty coffees are also delicious and always unique.
The staff is always kind and helpful, and there are some delightful inside and outside areas for doing work or catching up with a friend. It's a great and relaxed ambiance.
One thing to note... you can't really get an (iced) coffee under about $6. Not necessarily the worst thing, as the coffee is WELL worth it, but just something to note. (And the coffee is still priced similarly to starbucks, so it is definitely worth it for the quality).
Amazing coffee shop. Cozy and comfortable, staff was amazing and made a tasty latte similar to masala chai :) I highly recommend this place

This coffee place is absolutely amazing - just what Dilworth needs! The coffee was amazing, and the service was phenomenal. I had never been here before, and the gentleman working the counter gave me an number of great options and recommendations. I had a Pistachio Baklava Latte and it was absolutely amazing. There was plenty of seating inside and outside. I had been looking for a coffee shop in Dilworth to work in ever since the People's Market moved, and this place has definitely been a welcome addition.  Would 100% recommend and will be visiting frequently.
Incredible coffee. Neat spot.
Absolutely love this place! Been here multiple times since I found out about it recently. Love the different seating options. Excellent coffee/desserts!
Absolutely wonderful people and service. The coffee varieties and quality is the icing on the cake. If I don't go there everyday I get depressed. You have to go and check it out!!!

Been to a lot of coffee shops and this one may take the cake!!! Came with my family on vacation and the man at the window was the friendliest! He talked to us for 10-15 minutes and recommended the best drinks and food. We had a nitro coffee, vanilla latte, vanilla americano and pistachio latte to drink and the burrito and pistachio croissant to eat. Everything was spectacular- especially the croissant!  shoutout to the cashier for giving us a free drink too because I wasn't going to order something. Hope to be in charlotte again sometime to come back here!

Awesome family run place for coffee, pastries, and burritos (among other light brunch foods) on the weekends. We usually come here for breakfast at least once on the weekends. The most amazing friendly service! Love the unique coffee flavor options and the ability to specify how sweet you want anything. Dog and kid friendly too!

We have passed by here many times without stopping and always saw a gathering of people. I decided to stop by one afternoon  on a less busy day with my two daughters and it was perfect! The iced latte was delicious and refreshing. The atmosphere was friendly for my toddler and I could nurse my baby comfortably. The man behind the register explained their philosophy on natural ingredients and proceeded to give us two stickers, friendly conversation, and some lemonade on a hot day for my toddler. The inside is unpretentious and spacious for working. There are so many coffee shops around town but I don't think I have been to a friendlier one. We will definitely be back to try the food and more drinks!
First time here, and we're so impressed. TK is the man!

I don't think I've ever had so much fun placing a coffee order. The service was engaging from the moment I stepped on the porch. They helped me find a coffee order that was perfect for my taste and preferences plus the consideration of the 90+ degree weather. I got the iced Alaweena (with double the coffee to milk) which was the perfect balance for me because I prefer small batch roasted black coffee.

I took my coffee and went across the street to stitch at Charlotte Yarn. I had so much fun and such a great experience I went back to try the tea before I went home. I had the Ginger Peach tea with half sweetness and again, it was perfect for me. The effort they put into helping you find something you like is amazing.

I'm sad I live in Kansas and can't visit more often but I will definitely visit every chance I get!
Ryan is deserving of the name "The Flavor Tailor" he is spectacular at making unique flavorful dishes. He's also incredibly hospitable, I would recommend this place to anyone and everyone.

THE best coffee shop in Charlotte! The beans are organic and small batch custom roasted. The syrups are all natural. Everything is delicious and can be customized in any way.

This is a family owned business and the service and atmosphere is incredible.

The Orange Crush latte is my current favorite, it tastes just like one of those holiday chocolate oranges. They're always testing out and coming out with new drinks.

The food is really good too and the portions are generous.

Incredibly friendly staff and focused on high level service. Breakfast burritos are phenomenal! The owner took time to chat with us and tell us their story and future plans for the business, even gave me a free latte! Will definitely be back and will be sure to bring visitors to Charlotte here because this business exemplifies all the best qualities that Charlotte has to offer! Keep it up guys
Excellent coffee! Super nice owners too, we will be back

Literally the most friendly staff I think I have ever encountered in my life. The coffee and cheesecake (safe for Celiac!!!) were delicious and I can't wait to go back. Definitely a hidden gem. These are people who are in the business of making people feel good. Highly recommend.

It's a true honor to write this review. I first learned about backyard brew by attending a Thursday morning run club. This coffee shop has become a Thursday AND weekend staple! What makes this place special is the ingredients they use to create their speciality coffees. No syrups. No junk. They make everything in house and can customize sweetness and flavor profiles to your liking. Tried the breakfast burrito and was not disappointed. I recommend the Banana bread latte to accompany it! This is a locally owned establishment that I'll continue to support. There's parking located behind the house and ample seating inside and outside. You'll leave here wanting to come back!

Seriously the best coffee I've ever had, I can't go
to other coffee shops now  the staff is so welcoming and they are always so happy and make my day. I love that they use natural sweeteners and spices to give you coffee a unique taste. The food is great too! I can't say enough great things about this place.

This was brought to my attention by many bikers and runners who always stop there afterwards for coffee little breakfast and I said it's gotta be good if this is the go to. Today I  saw a clear drive in to this great coffee shop! . What delicious pancakes and pastry to go with a perfect coffee. I recommend this place!  Pricing perfect,

Super friendly barista who gave my son a sticker and made his day! Very helpful when placing an order to my personal presences and even offered a replacement drink if I didn't like my original order. Great place!
Great coffee spot! Love the variety here. Best service.
Loved it. Great family owned business. Enjoyed the Turkish coffee and Jordanian pancakes. Will be back again when in town again.
The customer service is fantastic and I love the coffee and chia pudding.

The most incredible coffee/tea shop that I have experienced (as it definitely is an experience) in years.  The Banana Bread Latte is enough to distract you from the rest of the world.  Also, you deserve the Pistachio Croissant in your life! You will need to ask for two of them because (1) You will not want to share yours and/or (2) the memory of it will make you leave everything that you are doing just to go get another one (all while asking yourself, why you didn't purchase two earlier that morning)!
To compliment the outrageously delicious menu items,  is the spectacular service that is provided. The owners remember orders of regular guests and today,  T.K. remembered my name, not because I told him, but because he listened to me and my colleague talking to one another as we waited for our order. Masterful!!!!
Do you remember the theme song for Cheers???? He nailed it...T.K and Backyard Brews...I will see you regularly!

This place is more than just a caffeine pick-me-up. Its a mental pick-me-up.
Only been one time, but I'm sold. Good service will do that, and this place is probably the friendliest, most genuine and engaging establishment in Charlotte. (Shoutout to TK!)
Next time I'm going out for coffee, I'll be going to backyard brew.
Next time I'm having a bad day, I'll be going to backyard brew.

Just got our second latte this week and we have made it our goal to try out every single flavor on their menu because they are THAT GOOD!!! It's been a while since we went to a business that treated us like we mattered more than what we spent- they ensure we like our drinks every time and refuse to let us leave unless we're fully satisfied with what we ordered (literally unheard of in this fast-moving society that treats you like a number). The owners have put so much soul in this little house and remember their customers, have intentional conversations with each one and the best part?! You get a lucky ducky for every visit!!! Truly the little things make this place worth the 5 stars they get. Our top favorite is the banana bread latte right now! Their chai mix is made in house from scratch and can't wait to try it next
Great people and great coffee
My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! The coffee is incredible and the atmosphere is inviting. Stick around a bit, enjoy the porch, and order the pistachio croissant!

I love this place so much, they have amazing customer service and truly go the extra mile to make their customers happy. I go here at least 1 to  2 times a week, and it's my happy place! Best service I've ever had.

This has been one of my favorite places to go to since moving to Charlotte. They are so friendly and always happy to make your drink how you want it. Everything I've had from here has been amazing! Highly recommend.
The friendliness of TK and the staff is what makes this place amazing. On top of that, they are the best coffee in Charlotte.
The Backyard Brew is the place you need to get out of your daily routine and have a crafted cup of coffee, made with love and specially for you.
The people who work here are so friendly, and of course the coffee is delicious. Can't ask for a better cafe.
Super cute, hyper local, all natural ingredients.

Amazing Coffee and Amazing Service!
Left feeling like a lucky duck!

Backyard Brew has been added to my list of favorite coffee shops (and so glad it's in my neighborhood!). On my first visit I tried the banana bread latte, which was delicious. So many offerings caught my eye, that I had to return the next day for an almond joy latte, which was incredibly yummy too!

The owners are so friendly and take time to ask about your taste preferences to craft the perfect drink for you. The atmosphere is very inviting! A friend and I enjoyed coffee in one of the Adirondack chairs on the front lawn. There's also a cozy front porch and indoor seating.

Highly recommend and already looking forward to my next visit!
Fantastic tea. Excellent service.

Backyard Brew is in a word: incredible. Regretfully, I drove past this cottage gem many times, hurrying here or there, since their opening. I WAS MISSING OUT.

So glad I finally made a point to stop. This was my third visit in less than two weeks and each experience as well as orders have been nothing short of amazing. BB's coffee and espresso are literally so so good -- flavorfully robust yet smooth, not watery or weak, and well-balanced. Tastes "pure".

As one who loves coffee and prefers each  served with intensity, BB's more than surpasses my expectations. I also believe theirs would be agreeable to most palettes, even those preferring the lesser end of the coffee-forward spectrum.

I applaud their many options and allowances for customizations. Their list of flavors, most if not all organic and natural extracts, make for some of the best iced lattes I've ever had. For example, banana extract and mint leaf additions, fresh grown on site.

I want to first promote their coffee and menu as legit but haven't even scratched the surface of why this ranks for me as one of the greatest, if not best, coffee houses in Charlotte. Besides their tasty offerings, Backyard Brew is family owned and operated by some of the most wonderful personalities and kind dispositions I've encountered. Their Jordanian heritage (some German, too, if not mistaken) brings an extra genuine warmth, knowledge, and hospitable flair to the already top notch service. Not only are they welcoming and inclusive of all, they literally go out of their way to acknowledge, inquire, and connect with each and every patron. Special shout outs to PK, Badar, and Hannah for your kindness, as well as the rest of the staff.

Further, just when you think the delicious drinks, food, and hospitality are enough -- BB outdoes themselves again by fostering a creative and encouraging environment. Adults and children alike are free to write, draw, and express on literally everything inside from the walls to the table tops. It is just stellar.

In summary, I could praise on and on, but Backyard Brew is quite simply magnificent. This will be my new hub going forward and I'm excited for more amazing visits. Give them a try, you won't regret it!

 features:
- Large Iced Nutella Mocha Latte (hazelnut + mocha profile customized with oat milk substitution plus banana extract & raw mint; large bevs auto come with double espresso = four shots, the flavor ratio is just right -- not overpowering or sickeningly sweet, well balanced for coffee to shine through)
paired with a Pistachio Croissant (generous portion that's enough to share or have leftovers, has both pistachio spread and crumbled toppings)
- The ever phenomenal Badar and PK (L to R) manning the cutest coffee window
- Family photo of my pup, Violet, and me enjoying the outdoor seating and sun
- Fireplace doodle: a mere preview of the eclectic interior writing and art
- Inspirational messages left by patrons

Backyard Brew offers the best coffee in the Queen City! The service is always top-notch, and the staff is incredibly friendly. It's my go-to spot for a perfect cup of coffee every time. Highly recommend!

Dropped by for the first time and was so impressed by the food and service!! Ryan and TK both greeted us and made us feel so welcomed. They offered us samples of the avocado toast on a sourdough English muffin which were was so good that my friend and I each ordered a serving. I also had a sample of their garden lemonade which was so reminiscent of lemonade I had when visiting Lebanon. Their Golden Latte was also amazing. Even though they were busy they took time to make us feel like part of the family. Definitely will be back!
Great coffee and service

Been stopping into Backyard Brew on the way to work about once a week since not long after they opened. Hands down the best place for flavored lattes, they also make a killer flat white. TK is one of the friendliest people you'll meet, can always count on a smile and a chinwag while he prepares your life elixir for the day.
See you next week!

Tried this place out for the first time today and will definitely be back again! Super friendly and lots of menu options. The chai latte was the best I've had and don't miss out on the breakfast burrito!
Cozy place to enjoy coffee!
Friendly, cozy and amazing blend of coffee
Delicious coffee and dog friendly! He even gave my pups a treat! Great service!
Could not have been better.  3 people in our party and we were all thrilled with the results
Ordered the banana bread iced latte and it was one of the best iced lattes I've had in the city. Wonderful staff who obviously care about their product and their customers. 10/10 would recommend!
Stop by this great place to enjoy the moment with a good beverage and delicious bakery, you won't regret it! Almond croissant was a treat, will be coming back to try other things on menu :)
The staff treats me and my family like their own. The coffee is the best in Charlotte.
Love this cute local coffee shop! Everyone was so friendly! Highly recommend if you're in the area.

Excellent and fast service. My new go to spot for espresso.  Always fresh highly recommended.
Update a year later
I had no idea they moved from pineville to their coffee shop in Dilworth.  I was sad when I saw their previous location had shutdown but I'm glad they are doing well and growing. The atmosphere at the shop is very unique and inviting. The wall art and guest provided inspiration is a wonderful experience to a great product. our almond croissant and coffees where beyond expectations. I'm glad to see such a great group of people growing and improving their business. Everything is handmade. Highly recommended. Every coffee shop we go to will now be compared to this one. I felt like they all truly wanted us to be there.  Was peaceful with several areas to sit and draw on the walls and make your mark on this amazing place.
Backyard Brew is 100% a community asset! Probably the highest quality coffee in the area with a total commitment to their craft!!

This place is amazing. The guys at the window are the most friendly people, they treat you as a neighbor and are so welcoming. They asked me questions about myself and travels, and just overall so kind. The iced pistachio baklava latte and Jordanian pancakes are 5 , they even brought out a sample of a family recipe of lentil soup and wow! Go here, you will not be disappointed. What a wonderful vibe!

Got a pistachio latte and a pistachio croissant- the latte is a little bit too sweet for me, but the croissant is AMAZING with crushed pistachio on top and full of pistachio spread inside. As a pistachio lover, I've tried so many pistachio croissants, and the one here is definitely on my top list. Need to mention that the owners are super nice and charitable, will come back again.

The absolute best! Fresh ingredients, warm and friendly conversation, relaxing porch atmosphere. The matcha, chai (made in-house!), and hibiscus lemonade are absolute hits  Favorite coffeehouse in CLT

We're visiting Charlotte and stopped here because it was across the street from where we grabbed lunch. The owner was very friendly and our oat milk lattes were delicious. You can tell they care about the quality of their coffee. We'll definitely be back!

Love Backyard Brew! They are so kind and approachable. Welcoming of everyone. Some of our favorites include the BBL (Banana bread latte), Nutella mocha, golden latte, TK's chocolate orange latte, the lemonade, the breakfast burrito, almond croissant, and the new cheesecake. TK and and his family are so personable and attentive to everyone's needs and preferences. Coffee and food are both great. So many options to choose from. Highly recommend!
This is our favorite coffee place in Charlotte. TK and the staff are awesome and it is always a highlight coming on the weekend! Thank you guys for being awesome

YOU MUST GO HERE. Incredible experience at this coffee shop. I'd say we're well versed in the coffee shops in the area and appreciate good quality coffee but this feels like a hidden gem and has the personality that some coffee shops lack because these owners clearly LOVE what they do and are so proud of what they offer. They care about your experience and go above and beyond in their service. They make everything from scratch in house using things like organic sugar and local honey etc. And they're super flexible on accommodating your order, making it less sweet etc. And it's not just the coffee that's great, the food (had the burrito and banana bread) are truly delicious and not over priced like a lot of things in CLT. Absolutely coming back to experience more soon.
This was such an amazing experience! Unique flavors, quality service, one of the most amazing local spots in Charlotte. I would recommend this is everyone and plan to be a regular visitor!

From the moment I walked up to the window, I felt like a very important customer! The owners are incredibly welcoming, warm & knowledgeable with everything coffee related. From the roasting process to sourcing their beans, you will find every type of flavor here. The customized blends of beans change every day and you can order any drink you like, just how you like it! The reviews speak for themselves and if you haven't tried this place yet, it's a must in Charlotte.  The location is so cute - a literal house. Parking is at the back and you feel like you're in someone's gracious home. God bless you and thank you for such a cool and wonderful environment! I will be back at least once a week :)
My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte!! Such a great menu and the staff is incredible!
Great service, location and atmosphere!!

First time here, amd thank goodness for delish coffee :) i got the banana bread latte (it really does taste like banana bread and there is an aftertaste almost as if you did eat it) very delicious. I also got the cinnamon roll, the first bite was so good, soft. It wasn't warm but I'm sure they can warm it up for you if you'd like. The best part of it all is that the sweetness wasn't overpowering, for both items. Support local!!!
Knowledgable and friendly barista! High quality coffee. Super foamy latte and not too sweet oat milk. This is the perfect coffee place

Just had my first experience at Backyard Brew! Absolutely love this place - the customer service is incredible, nicest people ever, super helpful and genuine. They want you to have the best coffee experience and I did! I ended up getting an iced peach black tea for myself and a latte for my boyfriend and both were so so good! They gave me a dessert to try as well and it was incredible- a cheesecake soon to be on the menu and when it is I will get it again :) will be back for sure! Probably tomorrow
What an amazing unique concept of coffee. I met the owner and can see through the passion he has in the business and coffee in general. Highly recommended. Will be stopping by again soon.
They let you draw on the walls!
Great chai latte and very chill vibe!

The oat milk cardamom cortado was perfect! The right balance of flavor to excellent coffee.
I love the feel of the space as well. Very much a homey vibe.
Amazing people and delicious coffee. I had the pour over with coffee cake and it was perfection. Highly recommend!
Cool little coffee shop, family owned and great quality ingredients!
TK is the absolute MAN! Love the service and coffee!

Such a fun experience! Stopped with a friend--the staff were so kind and the menu was very creative with some delicious and unexpected blends of flavor! Would definitely recommend stopping by if you're in the area.

I had a wonderful time chatting with TK. He and the other employees were very informative in regards to the coffees and were so welcoming. I tried the Turkish coffee which was very tasty and the Jordian pancakes were to die for!

From the second we saw the building I knew this place would be 10/10. The vibe is immaculate, both gentlemen that were working were so kind and helpful. The shop itself is super cozy and fun (plus they're pet friendly, love to see it). The coffee speaks for itself, the flavors are truly unique and divine. We got the pistachio baklava latte and banana bread latte - both were made to perfection!! We also got the pistachio croissant, I think it was the best croissant I've had in my life? And I'm not even being dramatic. Please come here, you won't regret it.

Stopped by this morning and TK was so friendly. Their Banana Nut latte is AMAZING!! We also had the pancakes which were weird but in the best way.. delicious. Great atmosphere and cute place to get work done. Will be back
Out of this world!!  Coffee is above and beyond excellent. Food is quality. The staff is out of the way friendly. Backyard Brew is a must visit..and often

This place is absolutely amazing! The staff is incredible. You tell them what your flavor profile and they will make a drink that will exceed your expectations. If it doesn't exceed your expectations, they will work with you to make it right. Best coffee and tea shop in Charlotte!!

TK and the crew there were exemplary. Super friendly, got me excited for coffee, but more importantly, the people who work and imbibe there. Enjoyment from the inside out, one might say :)

I'll be back for that banana steamer, one day.

I've been to backyard brew twice now and both times, it has far exceeded my expectations. Their lattes are absolutely amazing - I've tried the gingerbread and banana bread! I love how their focus is on flavor enhancement for the coffee, rather than being as sweet as possible. Additionally, their lentil soup is delicious. High quality ingredients, creative menu options, and genuine/friendly owners make this spot an absolute gem. My favorite coffee shop in clt!

Great decaf latte, super kind owners/employees, and awesome front porch seating. There's a bit of seating inside + a bathroom as well. The owner brought fresh pancakes out to my husband and me, on the house, while we played a card game - so surprising and fun!
The nicest service I've ever had in my life and delicious coffee!
Super cute spot and great coffee & cinnamon roll!
Best coffee shop in Charlotte! Service is amazing, coffee is even better! And the Jordanian pancakes are addictive! Definitely recommend checking them out.

Some of the best coffee and hands down the best service I've ever had. The staff is super friendly and will help you decide what coffee is perfect for you! Also their lentil soup is out of this world!
We had a vanilla latte and a banana bread latte. Magnificent!
11 out of 10! Great service, great food, and great people. TK and team are a delight plus their coffee is delicious. Jordanian pancakes for the win!
the coffee and experience was so memorable. Glad this is a part of the neighborhood

We travel around Charlotte trying different coffee shops and put this on our list based on the reviews.  It was well worth the 40 minute drive for us to try out the coffee!  There was a steady stream of customers when we went.  The coffee was fantastic and the converted house was super cool with a really nice covered porch where you can sit and enjoy your coffee. The service was great!  We will definitely be back even though it is quite far for us.  That will tell you how good it is!

My new favorite coffee place. The owners (forgot to ask their names) are very welcoming and that's what stood out for us.
We had their Signature drinks - Desert Rose and Raw Mocha. We asked for the flavors to be mild and that's exactly what we got. With each drink we were given a small cup to try the flavor without the espresso which is something I have never experienced.
Backyard brew is a hidden gem. We will be visiting again to try out other drinks.

Fast-tracked to be a Charlotte staple, Backyard Brews' drinks are brilliantly crafted, with each sip delivering a distinct flavor that is nothing short of impeccable.

The founder, Ryan, and I chatted for 15+ minutes before I connected the dots of his role to the shop. With each introduction to the team members, the crew's identity was clear - down to earth, generous, and passionate. If you can, stop by and say hi and ask about the business model. The shop's investment in the Charlotte community is distinct but especially laudable. The drinks are authentic, and the high-quality ingredients are noticeable.

I am not one to review, and I wish I were sponsored for this post! But no, this shop is simply a great addition to the Charlotte scene brought by solid people with good intentions, a good vision, and good talents.

Amazing coffee and Jordanian pancakes! On the first trip here I had a desert rose latte. Second trip had the iced eggnog latte. Also had an almond croissant sample they gave. Customer service is awesome, and they take the time to figure out what you like and how to make it just right.Will definitely be back soon!

Lovely little coffee shop with a couple of passionate owners! I got a banana bread latte that really does taste like banana bread but still in a subtle way that's not overwhelmingly sweet. They also make a great flat white. Really enjoy this place.

Amazing place! I would give more stars if I could. Fantastic coffee! The flavored lattes are incredible, very flavorful, not too sweet and compliments the coffee beautifully. TK is awesome and we even learned a bit of coffee knowledge to take home and try out with our own setup.

Such amazing coffee, and TK was so knowledgeable and friendly. We got a hot latte as well as TK's Chocolate Orange Crush (after trying a sample and being absolutely OBSESSED), both were phenomenal. The cinnamon bun (heated up of course) and the lentil soup were perfect on a chilly morning. We're so excited to go back already.
Awesome coffee and great service!
LOVE the coffee. Guys who work there are so kind. The best addition to our neighborhood.
Great experience, highly recommend!

Had the best experience at Backyard Brew. Not only was the staff friendly and kind, but they also gave great and honest recommendations about their menu. With so many intriguing choices, this help was appreciated. Aside from the coffee (which was fresh and flavorful), the lentil soup was EVERYTHING I needed on a chilly fall day. It came in a cup, so we walked around the area and enjoyed the meal on the go. The whole thing was quite clever and practical.

I haven't even mentioned the atmosphere. The porch has a big table (plenty of room for several people to spread out their belongings) and a cozy, couched seating area paired with a heater.

I can't wait to see how Backyard Brew expands within the building and Charlotte. Yall are the best! Will be back for more soup and coffee, and to try those pistachio pancakes.

Cheers,
Katie
These guys are PHENOMENAL human beings! Chai latte and Jordanian pancakes are my fav!!! I would recommend this place 1000x over!
Great Cafe. The owner and barista will custom make a drink for your taste and he absolutely crushed it.   Loved It!!
The BEST. That's it, that's the whole review.

12/10 best coffee in the area by a MILE. Super creative options too with an emphasis on high quality ingredients. Seeing TK also always brightens my day, he rocks. The only downside is I wish there was a lounge area so I could stay all day! When the weather is nice, the little porch does the job tho.

Just moved to Charlotte and was eager to try due to all the great reviews. My experience did not disappoint -- excellent coffee and hibiscus lemonade, and the friendliest, warmest welcome to the city! Incredible customer service and attention to detail -- the passion for his craft is so evident and felt throughout the experience.

Will definitely be going back!
Very nice owner. Turkish coffee is not 100% Turkish but it tastes well. I recommend.
Best coffee in Charlotte staff is very kind and passionate
This is a real coffee brewery who cares about their craft. The attention to detail and passion is tangible! Love their chai!
The man knows his espresso!
The staff and owners are amazingly kind. They really go out of their way to make sure you love your order.

Great coffee! When I saw all the 5 star reviews I figured I had to check this spot out and it didn't disappoint. TK is super friendly and eager to make drinks exactly how the customer likes it. I got an iced half caff oat milk latte and it was exactly what I was looking for. You can taste how high quality the beans are in the coffee. I'm surprised they don't have more 5 star reviews. Definitely worth checking out!

Tariq is the man. First time I went I was treated greatly. All the flavors are authentic and truly worth trying. Try the pancakes, I was surprised at how good yet different they are than a traditional pancake!
TK and his uncle radiate joy and make getting coffee a fantastic experience. They have a wide variety of coffees, teas, and snacks that are so delicious!

Arguable the best coffee in Charlotte. If you want true, authentic coffee, then this is the spot. All natural with no additives or preservatives. A place where you can order a drink and if you don't like it, they'll make one until you like it. No one else does that. 10/10. Not worth going anywhere else because it won't compare.
Unlike any other place in Charlotte. Coffee is unique and fantastic. The owners are hilarious and awesome!
Amazing coffee and really friendly staff. Highly recommended. I will be back to check out the food!
Great service, great atmosphere, and great coffee!
Wonderful cafe with delicious drinks! The guys that run it are attentive and take the time to get to know you. Will definitely be coming back! So good!
Best latte in Charlotte!

My favorite coffee shop in all of Charlotte! Their desert rose latte brings me back to my childhood in the Middle East. So heartwarming! Perfect amount of sweetness. It's our family's Sunday ritual to stop by to get coffee and a treat. 100% recommend!
Nutella Mocha was great as was the Jordanian pancakes.
A must try in Charlotte! Try their Petra latte and the Jordanian pancakes. Can't go wrong!
Great coffee, really cool guys, and just so nice!! Americano was perfect. Thanks!!!
Nice to have a proper espresso place nearby

OMG y'all, I low key want to keep this all to myself. My friend basically made me go here because she said it was so good and honestly -- it was better.

I love how it's a family business and they use all natural ingredients (no synthetic flavoring)... but what really stood out was the energy. Ryan, the owner, is so authentic and caring. I'm usually someone who wants to be left alone but he chatted with me lightly and offered to let me try the pancakes which were sublime. Then I watched as he knew the next woman's order by memory and before another man walked up with his baby and dog he placed a dog treat on the counter .

I was in a rush and this place made me forget. It felt like one of the most real interactions I've had with another human, food, and place in awhile. Needles to say, I'll be back and bringing friends. I can't wait to try the tea next!

Strongly recommend the dessert rose latte. It's got lovely fall aromatic vibes.
Fantastic coffee! You can tell they take pride in their craft.

Such a welcome addition to the neighborhood! The coffee is high quality, well-crafted, and strong. And the owners are just the nicest guys. I recommend asking for off-menu recs if you're in the mood for something different!

Best latte and cappuccino in all of Charlotte. Bold roast and great aroma. Pastries are well made and have amazing flavor. The employees always friendly and kind. Picture is after I had already tried my coffee. Great place to relax on a porch or work remotely.

WHAT AN INCREDIBLE PLACE!
Best coffee in Charlotte NC
We just recently moved our company to East Blvd and we met the owners of Backyard Brew and I am so lucky our paths crossed!! The coffee is incredible and the people and FANTASTIC!!

You much check them out!
Good coffee and super nice staff

This was my first time trying Backyard Brew, and after living in Charlotte for the past 16 years, this has to be hands-down one of my favorite coffee shops out of the plethora Charlotte has to offer. Not only is the quality of coffee excellent, the selection of unique drinks is plentiful, and the owners are some of the most inviting people I've encountered.
I am more than willing to drive the 30-45 minutes to get their coffee and support this fantastic small business.

Ps. Try the Desert Rose latte; it is so well-balanced and delicious. :)
Walked up on a walk with the dog and stopped in. Coffee was exceptional!

Very cool coffee spot. Tried the Turkish coffee and their spice blend is super flavorful and interesting. Service and atmosphere are top notch. A must for anyone looking for a good coffee at a neat location.

Came here for the first time today and the coffee is great! I tried the desert rose latte (iced) and it was perfectly flavored and not too sweet like a lot of the other places in the area. The Jordanian pancakes were also full of flavor and came in tray with four small pancakes. The folks running the place were super friendly and knowledgeable - will definitely be back!
These guys have got to be the friendliest people in Charlotte, love seeing this place doing well, they make a mean Turkish coffee

Such a great surprise! The owner welcomed us like real friends and the coffee was so good! Anything like I ever tasted! Flavourful, organic and with a perfect blend that doesn't dry or change your palate. I really suggest trying the Jordanian one!
Probably my new fav coffee place! Thank you guys!!
TK is the best! Coffee is amazing and rotating popsicles are delicious!

Greta coffee. And neat little spot. Had Turkish coffee but the rosewater latte will be my next try.  Good flavors like cardamom and pistachio.
Only suggestion would be "for here" guests to have real cups.
Super pleasant and friendly, helpful suggestions, clean ingredients, delicious coffee.
The best ! Can't get enough of this excellent coffee at a great price.
Awesome service. Had a great time. Perfect place to kick back have great coffee and meet cool people!

What an adorable spot! Came across it just driving down the street and saw a line outside, so decided to check it out. I got a matcha with oat milk and it was very good! Definitely a bit pricier than I'm used to, but for maybe $1 more than Starbucks, why not support a local family-owned business? I will be back!

Come visit TK and get a cold brew or latte using fresh ingredients. The beans are roasted here as well, the smell is heavenly! It reminded me of evenings in Dubai and Moroccan mornings. They are located at the 1218 East Blvd house with a green door across from Yafo Kitchen. There is parking in the back, just take a walk up to the window and enjoy! Also, dog treats are provided

Went here for the first time today, and it was such a treat! A nephew/uncle duo were working and their warmth and love for the business were felt immediately. The drink selection is unique, and the many options means there's something for everyone. I had an Oh Canada which tasted like a grown up mix of espresso with the milk leftover from a bowl of Cinnamon Toast Crunch. Will be back!
Just wanted to say thank you for being a staple in our family! They are lovely people and incredibly kind.
Amazing coffee & pancakes. Great local spot to enjoy your morning. The guys working want to get to know you and have a great coffee.
The lattes are SO GOOD. Not too sweet, but flavorful!

My kinda place! I am not a coffee expert...I'm a mocha gal. They customized it to my taste! And I love a good porch and chatty people. These 2 guys offer great coffee, a lovely porch and interesting conversation. And I could walk through the neighborhood to get there! I didn't have food this time.

We went on a dreary day but these two guys are delightful. They're building their business with a dedication to personable customer service. I highly recommend.

If the popsicles are available, make sure you get some; perfect treat on a hot day.

Serious coffee aficionados in Dillworth. CHARLOTTE. Worth the drive. Owners go out of their way to make you a unique coffee. These guys are the real deal made me an awsome flat white. Great porch to sit relax and enjoy
Super friendly, family owned spot. Coffee is phenomenal and and pistachio pancakes are out of this world. Best coffee spot in the area. HIGHLY recommend.
Great cup of Turkish coffee with exceptional customer service. TK was super knowledgeable and friendly! Will absolutely be coming back
Great coffee and great conversations with the owner today! He treats you like family and wants to ensure that you have the perfect drink to match your preferences. Highly recommended!
These guys are amazing... knowledgeable, friendly, and have the best espresso in town. Highly recommend
Great specialty coffee options that differentiates backyard brew from other local coffee shops. Very friendly staff
Very friendly & nice staff. Excellent coffee.

When only the best will do!  TJ and Ryan are phenomenal. Oh yeah, I did it on the thing. They don't cut corners and are absolutely top notch. I HIGHLY recommend them to anyone who appreciates the best.
Great coffee, great owners, great experience! 5/5!
